name: src/Context.js
Context
description: Context is passed to all components.

name: constructor
description: Context constructors

name: ofState
description: create Context of state, transform is identity

name: get
description: get value from state

name: changed
description: check if ctx has  changed

name: src/JSONPointer/index.js
TokenList
description:
An array of Strings
TokenList holds JSONPath tokens.

name: JSONPointer
description:
JSON Pointer defines a string format for identifying a specific value within a JSON document.
 This class holds methods for manipulation of pointers.

 For more information:
  - http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc6901
  - http://jsonpatch.com/#json-pointer

name: constructor
description: JSONPointer constructors

name: ofString
description:
parse str and return JSONPointer

If x starts with '/' create will treat x as a JSONPointer.
All other string will be treated like immutable js pointer (eg.: 'foo.bar')

name: toRFC
description: get rfc string representation

name: toImmutable
description: get immutable js string representation

name: first
description:
get first token

Return value is the first entry from token list.

name: last
description:
get last token

Return value is the last entry from token list.

name: size
description: return length of token array

name: concat
description: concat two JSONPointer

name: slice
description:
slice JSONPointer

slice has the same signature like Array.prototype.slice.

name: src/Patch.js
Patch
description:
json patch type.
- only add, remove and replace patches are supported
- http://jsonpatch.com

name: src/Transform.js
Map
description: Map holds transform informations.

name: Transform
description:
Transform tracks changes to state structure,
is used for mounting transforms.

name: constructor
description: Transform constructors

name: ofTargets
description: parse target keys to json pointer and return transform

name: sub
description: resolve keys from child transform with targets from object

name: apply
description: apply transform on JSONPointer

name: toTargets
description: returns targets (target pointer as rfc string)

name: equals
description: check if transforms are equal

name: isIdentity
description: check if transform is identify

name: src/decorators/checkContextType.js
checkContextType
description:
assert context type

```javascript
import t from 'tcomb'

checkContextType(t.struct({
	someProp: t.String
}))(model => { ... })
```

params.name: T
params.description: type to check context again (tcomb type)

name: src/decorators/component.js
component
description:
apply multiple decorators on component

```javascript
component(
	someDeoraotor(),
	someOther()
)(model => { ... })
```

name: src/decorators/mount.js
mount
description:
transform ctx of component

```javascript
mount({
	foo: '/some/value'
	bar: '/here/is/another/val'
})(component)
```

styler

add css styles as Object

```javascript
styler()(() => (<div style={{ color: 'green'}}>))
```

name: src/scopes/combiner.js
combiner
description:
combiner scope factory
represents map of (sub)scopes.

name: src/scopes/fragment.js
fragment
src/scopes/index.js
Scope
description:
scope
- stream representation of json data that (may) change
´* - flyd stream

name: ScopeFactory
description:
scope factory
- creates scope, who listen on input
- curried: opts -> input -> scope

name: BoundScopeFactory
description: bound scope factory

name: src/scopes/value.js
value
description:
value scope factory
Scope will update and emit value on every patch action.

src/utils/checkType.js
Type
description: tcomb type

name: check
description: 'booleanized' check function from tcomb

name: src/utils/choke.js
choke
description:
creates a choke that throttle fuction calls

The returned choke function will throttle calls with the same path argument
for delta milliseconds.

name: src/utils/curry.js
src/utils/cycle.js
cycle
description: pipes a to b and b to a -> cycle a and b

name: src/utils/patch.js
src/views/dom.js
dom
description:
This function is used to create the render part of your app.
If the view receives a context object, it will pass the context through your component.
All actions dispatched inside component, will be emitted from the view.

name: src/views/index.js
View
description:
view
- view stream representation
- views listen on contexts and render them in some way (e.g. dom)
- a view can emit patchSets
´* - flyd stream

name: ViewFactory
description:
view factory
- creates view, who listen on scops
- curried: opts -> input -> view

name: BoundViewFactory
description: bound view factory
